content: You can't uninstall amp off of my Android phone
replyContent:
Hi Jonathan! Thanks for reaching out. Here are the steps to uninstall the Google Home app:
Tap the Play Store icon on your home screen.
Search for "Google Home" or tap the "Apps" tab and scroll down until you find it.
Tap on the Google Home app, then tap "Uninstall."
Confirm that you want to uninstall the app by tapping "Uninstall" again.
